comments: Various privacy controls (including the ability to download your data as HTML or JSON) are available via the Facebook website: https://www.facebook.com/settings?tab=your_facebook_information
Facebook's Data Protection Officer can be contacted via this form: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/540977946302970
The email address mydataprivacyrights@fb.com is listed on Facebook's careers privacy policy.
We have previously listed Instagram under this record. We have since discovered better direct contact details and thus split the records.
